typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE2_ID as string,
		NCHAR_VALUE1 as string,
		NCHAR_VALUE2 as string,
		NUMERIC_VALUE1 as double,
		NUMERIC_VALUE2 as double,
		DATETIME_VALUE1 as string,
		DATETIME_VALUE2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DataSource
source(output(
		DIMENSION1_KEY as string,
		SOURCE2_ID as string,
		NCHAR_ATTRIBUTE1 as string,
		NCHAR_ATTRIBUTE2 as string,
		DATETIME_ATTRIBUTE1 as string,
		DATETIME_ATTRIBUTE2 as string,
		DSS_CREATE_TIME as string,
		DSS_UPDATE_TIME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> Dimension
Dimension select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			'DIMPREFIX_'+$$ = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimension
DataSource, SelectDimension lookup(SOURCE2_ID == DIMPREFIX_SOURCE2_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimension
LookupDimension select(mapColumn(
		DSS_CREATE_TIME = DIMPREFIX_DSS_CREATE_TIME,
		each(match(left(name,length('DIMPREFIX_'))!='DIMPREFIX_'),
			replace($$,'VALUE','ATTRIBUTE') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(DSS_CREATE_TIME = iif(isNull(DSS_CREATE_TIME), toString(currentTimestamp()), DSS_CREATE_TIME),
		DSS_UPDATE_TIME = toString(currentTimestamp())) ~> DerivedColumns
DerivedColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		DIMENSION1_KEY as integer,
		SOURCE2_ID as integer,
		NCHAR_ATTRIBUTE1 as string,
		NCHAR_ATTRIBUTE2 as string,
		DATETIME_ATTRIBUTE1 as timestamp,
		DATETIME_ATTRIBUTE2 as timestamp,
		DSS_CREATE_TIME as timestamp,
		DSS_UPDATE_TIME as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['SOURCE2_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	preSQLs:['EXEC	[dbo].[ZeroRow]\n		@p_tabname = N\'TMPL_DIMENSION1\',\n		@p_keycolname = N\'DIMENSION1_KEY\',\n		@p_varchar = N\'Unknown\',\n		@p_numeric = NULL,\n		@p_date = NULL,\n		@p_time = NULL,\n		@p_bit = NULL'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimensionSink
